attributes.description: The Peugeot 2008 1.2T Allure Auto has all the comfort you need, its spacious and has a stylish interior too. As if that’s not enough it has an infotainment system that gives you everything you need to tackle your day. This vehicle comes with a 5 year or 100 000kms warranty and a 3 year or 60 000kms service plan. Trade ins welcome and finance can be arranged.

attributes.description:

The Almera, is a smart sedan that is comfortable, affordable, spacious and eco-friendly, designed to have a presence on the road. Its the ideal family vehicle that everyone will enjoy wherever they go. The Nissan Almera is perfect for those short everyday trips and even those long weekend drives. The boot is spacious as well so you wont have an issue with the carting of the groceries or even packing in a suitcase

attributes.description:
Another rare car from Executive Cars. The TR3 used to be plentiful in this country but slowly they have drifted across the pond. The 3 wasnt around for long before the 3a appeared. The car drives well. It comes with a removable hardtop and tonneau cover. A charming example of the quintessential British sports car. I also have a 4, 5 and 6 if you want an instant collection........
Remember this is the rare one, the TR3 not the more common TR3A.
attributes.title: 1957 Triumph TR3
